plot: Encyclopedia of World War II presented in alphabetical order. Over 5 DVD's & 10+hrs. of footage; all the major battles, engagements, military commanders, civilian politicians, and weapons of World War II are covered in varying detail.
title: The Video Encyclopedia of World War Two
plot_es: Encyclopedia of World War II presented in alphabetical order. Over 5 DVD's & 10+hrs. of footage; all the major battles, engagements, military commanders, civilian politicians, and weapons of World War II are covered in varying detail.
